nodes.text: War-Master Rhigoth was a male Mandalorian mercenary who was the leader of a group of Mandalorians that started shaking down merchants in the city of Anchorhead during the Cold War. When Ledo Melnic, a local magistrate, ordered security to run them out of town, the Mandalorians crippled three of his officers and took over an old storage facility, converting it into a bunker. Rhigoth had a reputation for hunting Trandoshans, rancors, and even members of the Jedi Order, but the outside help hired by Melnic successfully stormed the bunker and killed him along with the others.
